import { useEffect, useState} from "react" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import Navbar from "./Navbar" const initState = { image: '', name: '', price: 0, brand: '', category: '' } function Edit() { const store = useSelector((data)=>data.productReducer.products) const [state, setState] = useState(initState) const val = useParams() console.log(store) let ID = +val.id console.log(ID) function handleChange(e){ const {name,value} = e.target setState({...state,[name]:value}) } useEffect(()=>{ const Data = store.find((er)=>el.id === ID) setState(Data) },[]) console.log(state) return (

Edit Your Product

) } export default Edit
